title: Thai Organic Life
description: Shop and juice bar on the main ring road in Lamai, opposite Lamai Resort. Sells a range of products including juicers, spirulina, chlorella, virgin coconut oil, organic soap and shampoo, goji berry, psyllium seed husk, bentonite clay, herbal detox kits, Thai fisherman pants, jumbo hammocks, natural bug spray, aloe vera, coconut soap, CDs & books, pro-biotics, and other natural health products. Hosts raw food classes. Move here in 2015 from 171/3 Moo 4.
